content:
I'd be happy to help you organize your recent online purchases by category.

To get started, could you please provide me with a list of your recent online purchases? You can share the following details for each purchase:

1. Date of purchase
2. Item description (e.g., product name, brand)
3. Category (if you're not sure, don't worry, I can help you categorize it)
4. Price

You can share this information in a list format, like this:

* Date: [Insert date]
* Item: [Insert item description]
* Category: [Insert category or leave blank]
* Price: [Insert price]

Once you provide the list, I can help you categorize your purchases into groups like skincare, fashion, electronics, and more.

If you have a lot of purchases to track, you might also consider using a spreadsheet or a budgeting app to help you stay organized. I can offer suggestions on how to set that up if you're interested!
